attributes.action: Hold a referendum on whether to keep the 2050 net zero target
attributes.additional_details: I believe net zero target lacks legitimacy and without a referendum the current climate change policy lacks the explicit consent of the people, as argued by The Harrogate Agenda. This exposes a massive democratic deficit in our system of government.
attributes.background: Set a referendum on whether the UK should continue with its 2050 net zero target.
